0.9.1.name: wordpress/my-social-links-bar
0.9.1.description:
My Social Links Bar WP is a plugin based on My Social Links Bar JQuery Plugin.

In the bar the WP owner can put her/his social medias links/profiles so people that navigate on site/blog will be able to access more information and reach the goal of social medias: Connect People, using a simple way for viewing them and reduce space inside the site.

In My Social Links Bar the WP owner will be able to:

  • Indicate her/his social medias links (facebook, youtube, twitter, myspace, yahoo, lastfm, vimeo, delicious, flickr, picase, linkedin)
  • Set the position of the bar - Top or Bottom / Left or Right
